data.name: Vacation Paradise: California Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
What could beat a sunny American vacay? A sunny American vacay with a bit of a treasure hunt thrown in. Vacation Paradise: California takes you on a trip across stunning locations, spanning Catalina Islands, Death Valley, Golden Gate, Napa Valley, Palm Springs, the works. Each destination also comes with fun trivia.

Collect all the Bears and Flags to unlock an Unlimited Mode and bonus minigames

• Explore 20 locations of California
• 19 Gold Medal achievements
• 5 Modes – Word, Silhouette, Scrambled Word, Missing Vowels, Riddle
• The Collector’s Edition includes 14 addition scene locations, with interactive and 2 zoom scenes per location
• 8 Mini Games with multiple levels.

data.short_description: Let's take a vacation across stunning California, with fun trivia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Intel Core i5 equivalent and above)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
